description: A versatile alpine all-rounder, this mid-weight Matrix™ softshell pant is designed for steep and technical climbing in all seasons. Durable, protective and wind-resistant it’s made for maximum comfort & freedom of movement on mixed mountain terrain.
name: Rab Ascendor AS Pants, Short - Mens

specs.value: Matrix™ double weave outer fabric with soft brushed back and fluorocarbon-free DWR - 207 g
